high_elves.name: High Elf Worlds
high_elves.description: The High Elf Worlds are a group of large constructed fleet habitats. They focus on a mobile and deadly mix of advanced technology and unique fast tactics to achieve victory

dark_elves.name: Dark Elf Raiders
dark_elves.description: The Dark Elf Raiders are a group of elves who have an obsession with attacking a raiding settlements for plunder. Their tactics revolve around attacking quickly with highly agile ships and doing damage after which they quickly escape.

alien_swarm.name: Alien Swarm
alien_swarm.description: A swarm of aliens from far-away systems controlled by an ancient hive mind. They feast on other species, absorbing their biomass to turn into more of their kind. They have a combination of deadly creatures and swarms of agile aliens to defeat their foes.

alien_cults.name: Alien Cults
alien_cults.description: The Alien Cults are a loose band of alien worshippers who have been infiltrated by an Alien Swarm. They form on unsuspecting planets and eventually grow strong enough to take control. Alien Cults use a mix of hybrid alien creatures and scavenged weapons along with guerilla tactics.

traitor_marines.name: Traitor Marines
traitor_marines.description: The traitor marines are a band of marines that betrayed the Human Empire and now cooperate with demons and other heretics to pursue their own desires. They have a mix of deadly beasts, dangerous war machines and tough marine infantry.

rage_focus.name: Rage
rage_focus.description: Traitor marines focused on anger and brutal close assault to defeat their foes.

stealth_focus.name: Deception
stealth_focus.description: Traitor marines focused on stealth and deception to defeat their foes.

pestilence_focus.name: Pestilence
pestilence_focus.description: Traitor marines focused on using disease and decay to defeat their foes.

change_traitors.name: Psychic
change_traitors.description: Traitor marines focused on using powerful magic to defeat their foes.

dimensional_horrors.name: Dimensional Horrors
dimensional_horrors.description: The dimensional horrors are a species of demon entities from an unknown dimension controlled by several demon lords. Their existence is largely not understood. They focus on rapid and unpredictable entry and deadly waves of infantry and beasts to surprise and overwhelm their foes.

undying_machines.name: Undying Machines
undying_machines.description: The Undying Machines are a race of once-people now turned into machine beings that are immortal. The Undying machines rely on waves of reanimating machines and advanced ancient battle technology to win their battles.

solar_fire.name: Solar Fire
solar_fire.description: Undying Machines focused on overwhelming firepower.

combat_focus.name: Close Combat
combat_focus.description: Undying Machines focused on deadly close assaults.

elven_keepers.name: Elven Keepers
elven_keepers.description: The Elven Keepers are a race of elves who are tasked with keeping the grand elf library. They have a unique close combat and fast oriented style with deadly weaponry and quick jetbike and hovercraft vehicles.

tao_federation.name: Tao Federation
tao_federation.description: The Tao Federation is an alliance of several alien species to band together in the name of survival and prosperity. The Tao rely on a mix of advanced battle warsuits and deadly pulse weaponry to defeat their enemies.

ascended_astroraptors.name: Ascended Astro-Raptors
ascended_astroraptors.description: Uplifted millenia ago by an unknown precursor race, the Ascended Astro-Raptors advanced from feral beasts to exploring the stars with high-tech lasers and armor.

combat_masters.name: Close Combat
combat_masters.description: An Ascended Astro-Raptors trained and drilled in deadly close combat fighting.

marksmanship_focus.name: Marksmanship
marksmanship_focus.description: An Ascended Astro-Raptors with the best shooting skill in the galaxy.

knight_lords.name: Knight Lords
knight_lords.description: The Knight Lords are a loose organization of many different knight guilds which build and maintain unique and gigantic war machines. The Knight Lords rely on huge Knight war machines and good old fashioned chivalry to pound their foes.

battle_sisters.name: Battle Sisters
battle_sisters.description: The Battle Sisters are a sect of the Human Empire which have a uniquely faithful and religious background. The Battle Sisters rely on prayer and faith in their holy symbols along with some good old fashioned holy fire to defeat their enemies.

machine_guilds.name: Machine Guilds
machine_guilds.description: The Machine Guilds are a unique group of several different but organized planets which create and maintain all sort sof wild war machines and contraptions. The Machine Guilds rely on technological augmentation and deadly weapons to destroy their enemies.

stealth_masters.name: Stealth
stealth_masters.description: A Machine Guild focused on stealth uses surprise and infiltration to defeat its foes.

imperial_defense_force.name: Imperial Defence Force
imperial_defense_force.description: The Imperial Defense Force is the backbone defense force of the many civilian planets of the empire. They are the first to respond to any miliary threats. They rely on hardy battle tanks and good old artillery shells along with waves of human soldiers to defend the Empire.

neon_hive.name: Urban
neon_hive.description: This section of the Imperial Defense Force recruits the elite, drafts the reasonable, and drags the hivescum from a large, heavily overpopulated neon-lit world of Megacities and gang-warfare.

combat_masters.name: Close Combat
combat_masters.description: An Imperial Defense force trained and drilled in deadly close combat fighting.

marksmanship_focus.name: Marksmanship
marksmanship_focus.description: An Imperial Defense force with the best shooting skill in the galaxy.

loyal_marines.name: Loyal Marines
loyal_marines.description: The Loyal Marines are the pride of the Human Empire and its elite order-keeping force should they need to be deployed. The Loyal Marines rely on tough infantry and somewhat advanced vehicle technology to outsmart and eliminate their enemies.

combined_arms_focus.name: Combined Arms
combined_arms_focus.description: Loyal Marines who specialize in combined arms tactics.

zeal_focus.name: Zeal
zeal_focus.description: Loyal Marines with a righteous zeal.

mobility_masters.name: Mobility
mobility_masters.description: Loyal Marines focused on using mobility and speed to outflank their enemies.

siege_masters.name: Siege
siege_masters.description: Loyal Marines focused on sieges and defeating entrenched enemies.

toughness_focus.name: Toughness
toughness_focus.description: Loyal Marines that are tougher than the rest.

forge_focus.name: Craftsmen
forge_focus.description: Loyal Marines that are expert craftsmen and tough in battle.

stealth_focus.name: Stealth
stealth_focus.description: Loyal Marines focused on stealth and ambush tactics.

tactical_masters.name: Tactical
tactical_masters.description: Loyal Marines focused on using tactics and cunning to outsmart their enemies.

wolf_marines.name: Counter-attack
wolf_marines.description: Loyal Marines that specialize in brutal counter-assaults in close combat.

assault_focus.name: Assault
assault_focus.description: Loyal Marines focused on all-out assaults and aggression.

psychic_marines.name: Psychic
psychic_marines.description: Loyal Marines focused on psychic tactics and hunting demons.

alien_hunters.name: Alien Hunters
alien_hunters.description: Loyal Marines focused on hunting aliens.

throne_guardians.name: Throne Guardians
throne_guardians.description: The Throne Guardians are the defenders of the Human Empire's capital. Only the most elite Loyal Marines are recruited to be Throne Guardians and with that they are the most well-trained. The Throne Guardians rely on the most elite and well-trained infantry along with powerful and ancient war weaponry to defend their home planet.

orc_clans.name: Orc Clans
orc_clans.description: The Orc Clans are a mostly disconnected species of clans who are constantly at war with others and each other. The Orc Clans rely on massive all-out assaults and cobbled-together technology and vehicles to outlast and overwhelm their foes.

goblin_army.name: Goblin
goblin_army.description: An Orc Clan with an abundance of powerful and well-equipped goblins.

combat_focus.name: Close Combat
combat_focus.description: An especially tough Orc clan with a focus on close combat.

speed_focus.name: Speed
speed_focus.description: An Orc Clan with a need for speed.

shooting_focus.name: Shooting
shooting_focus.description: An Orc Clan with an addiction for shiny weapons.

imperial_inquisition.name: Imperial Inquisition
imperial_inquisition.description: The Imperial Inquisition is the order dedicated to hunting dangerous demons and other Psychic entities which cannot be trusted in the Human Empire. Their tactics rely on using skilled demon hunting individuals along with advanced assassins to hunt and destroy those who most dangerous.

skirmish.name: Generalist (Core)
skirmish.description: A well-rounded force for taking on any mission.

strike.name: Strike (Core)
strike.description: A strike force for outflanking or shock assaulting.

specialist.name: Specialist (Core)
specialist.description: An elite force to deal with specific targets.

heavy.name: Heavy (Core)
heavy.description: A heavy force to pack a punch on the field.

inspired.name: Inspired
inspired.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Inspired.
inspired.flavor: This model inspires the best in those who serve them.

blast.name: Shock Wave
blast.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hits with AP 1. This power may be cast unlimited times.
blast.flavor: This enemy is hit by a single blast of shock.

wings.name: Wings
wings.description: Increases movement by 2". Gives the model fly and ambush.

scrambler.name: Scrambler
scrambler.description: Enemy units arriving from reserves within 18" of this model suffer -2 Initiative on reserve tests.

banner.name: Banner
banner.description: This unit may re-roll a single failed Courage test when removing Shock.

net.name: Net
net.description: Units engaged in Melee with a model that has this weapon suffer -1 to Initiative tests when escaping combat for each weapon with this rule.

web.name: Web
web.description: Units hit by this weapon lose 2" from their next move.

assault_ramp.name: Assault Ramp
assault_ramp.description: Units disembarking from this unit gain +3" of Movement for that action.

stun.name: Stun
stun.description: Instead of inflicting damage, if this weapon hits its target, that unit gets -1 Strength and -1 Accuracy for its next attack.

banner_of_wrath.name: Banner of Wrath
banner_of_wrath.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" gains +1 AP on all Melee weapons.

banner_of_focus.name: Banner of Focus
banner_of_focus.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" gains +1 AP on all Shooting weapons.

poison.name: Poison
poison.description: Each successful hit roll of 4 or less with this weapon gets +1 AP.

lance.name: Lance
lance.description: This weapon gets +1 AP when used during a Charge.

dozer.name: Dozer
dozer.description: This model may cross low obstacles without penalty.

shielding.name: Shielding
shielding.description: Whenever this model loses a wound, roll a D10. On a 3 or less that wound is not lost.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: Whenever this model loses a wound, roll a D10. On a 3 or less that wound is not lost.

psych_out.name: Dangerous(Psychic)
psych_out.description: This weapon has +1 AP against units with the Psychic special rule.

dark_prism.name: Dark Prism
dark_prism.description: Once per round, when a model with Psychic(x) casts a power within 24", roll a D10. If the die roll is lower than or equal to the casting roll, the power is prevented.

medical_training.name: Medical Training
medical_training.description: Whenever this model, or a friendly _Infantry_ model within 6" is killed or loses a Wound(x), roll a D10. On a 3 or less, that loss is prevented.

ward.name: Ward
ward.description: Once per round, when a model with Psychic(x) casts a power within 24", roll a D10. If the die roll is lower than or equal to the casting roll, the power is prevented.

legend_strategist.name: Brilliant Strategist
legend_strategist.description: While this model is on the table you gain 1 additional Strategy Point per round.

gravity.name: Gravity
gravity.description: This weapon gets +2 AP against targets with Save 10 or higher.

titanic.name: Titanic
titanic.description: When this unit is activated it may only perform one action and benefit from abilties which trigger when the unit is activated once. It may then be activated a second time to perform its second action.

heavy_impact.name: Heavy Impact
heavy_impact.description: When this model successfully charges an enemy unit, make X Strength tests. For each success, the enemy takes 1 hit with AP 1.

emp.name: EMP
emp.description: Successful hit rolls of 5 or less gain +2 AP.

jetpack_character.name: Jetpack
jetpack_character.description: Increases movement by 2". Gives the model fly and ambush.

jetpack.name: Jetpacks
jetpack.description: This model's movement is increased by 2". This model may cross all terrain as if it was not there. This unit may be set aside in reserves before the match begins if all models have ambush. Any round after the first, when this unit is activated while in reserves, you may choose a point on the battlefield 12" away from any enemy units and take an Initiative check. If passed, place the unit at that location on the location. If failed, use D10 scattering to determine the landing location of the unit relative to the chosen point.

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.description: The firer must take 1 save for each hit roll of 9+.

destroyer_armor.name: Destroyer Armor
destroyer_armor.description: Gives the model the ambush keyword. Gives the model Save 8.

mutations.name: Mutations
mutations.description:
At the beginning of the game choose one of the following effects to be applied to this unit: 
 * +1 AP to their attacks  
 * +1 attacks per model 
 * +1 Save

disk_of_change.name: Disk of Change
disk_of_change.description: Gives the unit hover and Impact(1). Also increases the units movement by 2".

field_radio.name: Field Radio
field_radio.description: This unit may be targeted by the _Defense Force Tactics_ special rule if it is within 24" of another unit with a _Field Radio_ that is in range of the _Defense Force Tactics_ rule.

field_radio_stormtrooper.name: Field Radio
field_radio_stormtrooper.description: This unit may be targeted by the _Storm Trooper Tactics_ special rule if it is within 24" of another unit with a _Field Radio_ that is in range of the _Storm Trooper Tactics_ rule.

stormtrooper_tactics.name: Storm Trooper Tactics
stormtrooper_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Storm Trooper_ _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ 
 * Re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ 
 * +3" of Movement 
 * +1 AP

fusion.name: Fusion
fusion.description: Enemy units add 1 to rolls on any _Damage Table(X)_ rules when hit by this weapon at Short range.

bomb.name: Bomb
bomb.description: This weapon may be fired at any time during this unit's move.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.description: This unit may cast X psychic powers at any point during its movement. To cast, roll a D10 and if the result is equal to or less than the psychic power's cast value it is successful. A unit may only successfully cast each psychic power once per turn. Any other Psychic unit within 24" may attempt to dispel the Psychic attack. Roll a D10. If the value is lower than the rolled value for the psychic test, the power is stopped. If the spell is not stopped, no further attempts may be made to stop the same power. If this model is locked in Melee, it may only target units in the combat. This ability may not be used against enemy units in melee with friendly units.

psychic_prowess.name: Psychic Prowess
psychic_prowess.description: All Psychic power charge values are increased by X for this model. For example a power requiring a 6 or less now requires 6+X or less.

hover_mode.name: Hover Mode
hover_mode.description: When this Aircraft is activated, it may choose to fly in Hover mode. If it does, units do not suffer -1 Accuracy when targeting this unit, but it is not required to make a move action when activated.
